parameters:
Ruth: (She hasn't noticed me at all. This looks
like it's going to be easy...)

Cyan: "Master Ruth...♥ From now on, please command
me as you wish..."
Ruth: (Now then, how should I use this one...)

Ruth: (...Wait a second? She's a sorceress, maybe
she can defeat the female warrior?)

Ruth: (Maybe I should have a little chat with
her.)

Ruth: "Hey, can't you use your power to defeat the
female warrior?"

Cyan: "Are you referring to the female warrior who
is said to protect this village...?"

Cyan: "She seems to be quite skilled, so I'm not
sure if there will be time to cast magic..."

Cyan: "Besides, I'm sorry to say, I'm good at
alchemy but a bit weak with attack magic..."

Ruth: "I see... Then, do you have any kind of
magic potion that might be useful?"

Cyan: "If she drinks this, even someone with high
resistance should sleep soundly for several hours,
I believe."

Cyan: "It's not completely tasteless and odorless,
but its effect won't change even if heated, so
it's best mixed into food or something."

Ruth: "Alright, then you give this to the female
warrior to drink."

Cyan: "Even if you say so... I hardly ever go out,
so I don't know her personally, which makes it
difficult."

Ruth: "Hmm... understood. I'll think of
something... For now, I'll take this potion with
me."
Cyan: "Yes... Please make good use of it."
Cyan: "Lord Ruth, do you need something?"

Cyan: "Is that so? Please feel free to consult
with me anytime if you need anything."

Ruth: "Let me ask you, do you know what this
necklace is?"

Cyan: "It seems to be an amulet that has the power
to ward off holy forces."

Cyan: "Normally, amulets are meant to ward off
evil forces... This is quite unusual."
Cyan: "Lord Ruth, where did you get this?"

Ruth: "I took it from a mansion in this village. I
sensed a demonic presence there."

Cyan: "I've heard that the daughter of that house
has been ill for a long time. Perhaps this is
influencing her condition..."
Cyan: "Was I able to help you?"

Cyan: "Is that so? Please feel free to consult
with me anytime if you need anything."
Cyan: "Lord Ruth, is something the matter...?"

Ruth: (She's a magician too, so she might be
useful. But I recall her saying she's not good
with attack magic...)

Ruth: "You said you're not good with attack magic,
but can you fight?"
Ruth: "There's someone I need to take down..."

Cyan: "As long as there's a vanguard, I can manage
to fight to some extent..."
Ruth: "Then lend me a hand... Follow me."

Cyan: "If there's anything you need, please let me
know..."
Cyan: "Lord Ruth, is something the matter...?"
Ruth: "After all, lend me a hand... Follow me."

Cyan: "If there's anything, please call out to
me..."

Ruth: (There are various things scattered
around... Is this the house of a magician?)

Ruth: (I can see the figure of a woman from behind
in the back... It seems like she's investigating
something.)
Cyan: "Now then, back to the experiment."
Ruth: (Phew, I've managed to sneak in safely...)

Ruth: (After all the trouble of sneaking in,
what's the point of leaving now...)
